title: We Were Tired Of Being There. Why Teens Broke Out Of Tenn. Facility
teaser: Officials in Tennessee are still investigating how 32 teenagers broke out of the state's highest-security juvenile detention center in September. All the inmates have been captured, but the breakout cast a harsh spotlight on the troubled facility.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
